def_cn: (火炉、锅炉或熔炉的)调节风门，风挡
def_en: A damper is a small sheet of metal in a fire, boiler, or furnace that can be moved to increase or reduce the amount of air that enters.

def_cn: (钢琴等乐器的)制音器，减音器
def_en: A damper is a device in a piano or similar musical instrument which makes the sound less loud by restricting the movement of the strings.
To put a damper on something means to have an effect on it which stops it being as enjoyable or as successful as it should be.
